text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1906 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ==Deaths== ==Births== ; February * 3 – Ludvig Nielsen, composer and organist (died 2001). ; July * 19 – Klaus Egge, composer and music critic (died 1979). ==See also== * 1906 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1900s in Norwegian music
title: 1906 in Norwegian music
